provider.name: Fireworks
provider.description: Fireworks AI is a generative AI inference platform to run and customize models.

models.title: Chat Completions
models.description: Portkey suports majority of chat models offered by Fireworks

models.title: Embed
models.description: Portkey suports majority of embed models offered by Fireworks

models.title: Vision
models.description: PPortkey suports majority of vision models offered by Fireworks

supported.note: Fireworks model names generally have `accounts/fireworks/models/` prefix. For example, to use llama-v3p1-405b-instruct, you need to pass `accounts/fireworks/models/llama-v3p1-405b-instruct` as the model name.

notSupported.endpoints: Portkey currently doesn't support any speech endpoints by Fireworks

features.title: Function Calling
features.description: The function calling API allows a user to describe the set of tools/functions available to the model and have the model intelligently choose the right set of function calls to invoke given the context.

features.title: Grammar Mode
features.description: Grammar mode is the ability to specify a forced output schema for any Fireworks model via an extended BNF formal grammar (GBNF format).

features.title: Json Mode
features.description: JSON mode enables you to provide a JSON schema to force any Fireworks language model to respond in

portkeyPythonSDK.description: Use Portkey Python SDK to make text calls to Fireworks chat completions models
portkeyPythonSDK.codeExample: sample python code for llama-v3p1-405b-instruct call on Fireworks

integrationViaVirtualKey.description: Integrate Fireworks using Portkey's virtual key system

inline.text: Get your API key from Fireworks and add it to Portkey to create a virtual key.
inline.description: You can get your Fireworks API key from the Fireworks website [here](https://fireworks.ai/login).

portkeyPythonSDK.description: Initialize Portkey with the virtual key in Python
portkeyPythonSDK.codeExample: sample python SDK code for llama-v3p1-405b-instruct chat completions call on Fireworks using virtual key

portkeyNodeSDK.description: Initialize Portkey with the virtual key in Node.js
portkeyNodeSDK.codeExample: sample node.js SDK code for llama-v3p1-405b-instruct chat completions call on Fireworks using virtual key
